list.name: Breaking Bad API
list.desc: - Fan project. A simple tool for DEA agents, to manage information about characters from the Breaking Bad/Better Call Saul universe.

list.name: Utility Cost Tracker
list.desc: - Utility Cost Tracker connects various smart home devices to a Django application.

list.name: BoardGameGeek Rating Tracker
list.desc: - A small Django app that uses the Board Game Geek API to track and visualize Board Game Geek ratings for selected games, as well as to send weekly and monthly reports for any changes in the ratings.
